values:
HMMM... so we have this "SENIOR RESEARCH PAPER" right??? which will be the death of me.. and im trying SOOOO hard to get a good grade on it but its not looking good.. every time i turn a rough draft in.. theres SOMETHING wrong with it.. and i lost my BIB cards... dun dun duuuuunnn...

so this weekend will be CRAP... i told them to schedule me all weekend cause i didnt wanna be bored while roller was outta town.. so they do.. and he was like "BABE!! I HAVE A SURPRISE FOR YOU!!!! IM NOT GOING!!!!!!" so im like =o NOOOOOOOOOOOOO cause i work til 10 on both friday AND saturday.. and he has off friday but not saturday.. but saturday he gets off at 9 :( BUT anyways so im fucked... :( BUT he said hed wait for me to get off and then we'd go to roberts or marcillinos :) ((howEVER you spell his name)) but yeah.. i dont know... were going to see the INCREDIBLES thursday :) :) :) i CANT WAIT .. and i already know what im getting him for christmas ;)

ANYWHO!! other than me and rolando.. my life is... boring?? haha he is my life.. lol im ALWAYS over there or were always together... <3 ::sigh::

man.. im out this bitch! good day :)
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/19400.html

so tonight was by FAR the most awesome :) we went out to eat <3 and then we were gonna watch a movie but there was nothng out we really wanted to see.. so we went to marcalino's :) hung out with TONS of ppl and then me and roller went to his house and i started to fall asleep cause he was playing with my hair.. i warned him.. but he didnt listen.. he says its too soft to NOT touch haha wtf? but i LOVE when ppl play with my hair so i was like eh! w/e :) so he was being like... soooooofdjslkjfklsjfla sweet.. i dont know.. i wont get into it :) but it was a great night.. and then even though we live close, he still called to make sure i got home safe fjklsa what guy does that these days??? MINE! hahah jk.. and he was like "babe, i have to work tomorrow but i wanna see you.. so maybe after work we can rent movies? and eat ice cream? and pop corn? the old kind like on SCREAM?" jfkldsa its insane.... so tomorrow.. ill be with him all my day.. hopefully i go on break at the same time.. :) i work the booth tomorrow... and everyday following that :( but its cool.. well i think thats all for tonight :)

night lovies <3

PS- ROLLER PICKED ME UP FROM SCHOOL TODAY TOO... jdflksa <3 <3 <3 k im done this time for real... i swear...
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/18944.html

yayaya... so me, roller, albert, ivan, ben,randal, brian, and pedro worked today... id have to say we're the BEST workers together EVER!! haha its SOOOO much fun when roller's working and josh isnt... ^_^ anyways.. so we're GOOOD friends with the guys next door((village pizza)) and like.. they gave us a free pizza :) yum.. so me roller and albert and ivan ate pizza :) saturday i start the booth :( womp womp womp... oh well.. 7 bucks an hour baby!!

tomorrow me robert roller and brit are going out :) to eat.. and to a movie.. etc. etc. starbucks etc. vanilla beam frap. ^_^ mmm... hahah 

i talked to alyssa! its good to hear shes doing well :)

ahhh... nothing else to write about so im out!

the phone rings
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/18727.html

ROADRUNNER???

ahhh i really dont have time to write... im about to go to gerlands to see roler cause he wants me to hahah.. hes crazy.. and wonderful all at the same time.. forgive me if i hurt feelings or make anyone feel weird.. i couldnt help how i felt... and i KNOW it was wrong and i totally appologize...

i voted... and i pray america is left in the best hands...

ahh... i feel bad now... i have to go..

peace
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/18686.html

so todays my... birthday?? :: sigh :: my mom and dad forgot... and have yet to say anything.. shitty.. again.. um.. its kinda funny though.. cause rolando remembered.. and he got on the intercom at work.. as was like "HAPPY 18th BIRTHDAY KRISTIN!!!" and then everyone was yelling out "HAPPY BIRTHDAY :D" haha.. it made me smile.. hmm.. im not so sure what im doing tonight.. but.. yeah haha.. im out!

PS- I ENCOURAGE EVERYONE TO GO OUT AND BUY THE NEW RILO KILEY CD ((MORE ADVENTUROUS)) CAUSE ITS THE BOMB DIGGITY :)
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/17580.html

our LAST NIGHT of summer.. how LAME haha anyways.. i dont have much to update about.. but im bored and have nothing  else to do.. my mom's being LAME>. she bugs me about EVERYTHING i do

"why are  you wearing that stupid braclet kristin?" ((the one i got from bowling))

"why do you tie your shoes like that.. thats gay"

"why dont you clean MORE around here kristin"

"why is your hair that ugly color.. you need to do something about that shit"

"isnt it about time to RE-PAINT your nails?? i do"

she complains about ANYTHING and EVERYTHING.. GUH.. and its pissing me off.. but i cant say anything because im about to turn 18.. and she wont hesitate to kick me out.. and quite frankly.. i have NO WHERE ELSE TO GO! SO.. with that said.. i have to keep my mouth shut.. but i dont know how much longer its gonna last.. cause i think i do enough around this house.. in fact.. ariel pointed out to her that i do the most.. BUT.. im the girl.. and nothing i clean is EVER good enough ... ok.. enough of MEEE complaining :)

good day :)
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/14759.html

HMMMM

List of my FAVORITE things to do :)   :

1)fuck up social lives
2)see how many people i can get to hate me all at one time
3)piss off my mom as much as i possibly can and get her on the verge of kicking my ass out :)

today me and ben went to see napolean dynamite.. it was funny[.] um.. im kinda at loss of words and my stomach is all fucked up cause i feel bad about soemthing that wouldnt work anyways.. y did i stress myself over it so much? i should have listend to ______ and left him alone a long time ago.. and stop trying to make peace.. i dont see y he tried so much.. i was just another girl he said all that shit to right? GAHH.. fuck it..

tomorrow my brothers having a "party" with all his freshmen friends yay.. jump for fucking joy.. fran will be there ... hopefully.....

good day[.]
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/14402.html

my friend kristan tried to committ suicide this  morning.. she jumped off the bridge intersection on i-10 and john martin..

i would have NEVER thought of her to make such a choice.. she was always laughing.. i dotn know..

...

i talked to her the day she was taking her senior pics.. i would have said so much more if i would have known it was the last time i saw her

....
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/14203.html

doot n dooo! lifes grand right now for me :).. nothing to really update on.. BUT.. alyssa is sending a "SURPIRIIIIISE" ^_^ i hate surprises and love them all at the same time.. it makes me feel good to know someone thought about me throughout their day :) alyss.. you're grand sista.. GRAND I SAY!

school starts soon :) kinda excited.. OK OK.. REALLLY excited :) only cause my year is looking up for me and i have SO much motivation goin on :)

well.. im out cause im cooking supper for the familia! and a cake for my brother since hes 14 today :)

HAPPY BIRTHDAY ARIEL!!!! I LOOOOOVE YOU BROTHUH!!

GOOD DAY! ^_^
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/14022.html

ok so today ive cleaned my ass off.. ^_^ so i can spend francisco.. we're "together".. and i like it.. in fact, i LOVE it.. it feels SUPER different from all the guys ive talked to since justin. and i can DEF say that i feel like we'll last for a LONG time ^_^ anyways..

i dont think i have anything NEW or INTERESTING besides me and fran :)

skaFEST is coming up ^_^ SOOOOO many exciting shows coming up .. and that concludes my update :)

GOOD DAY TO ALL!
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/13472.html

florida was the BOMB!! DYNOMITE ahah alex came with since he was visiting his mom for the next few weeks.. and i had to replace justins ticket with someone elses ^_^..

BUT... ok.. ive been talking to this "character" thats SOOOOOOOO freaking awesome.. adn well.. i like him.. he makes me forget about everything bad.. and hes SOOO freakin awesome/cool... OMG.. :: melts :: haha but the BAD thing is.. hes justins friend.. and we KNOW hell get mad, but if he can be happy, then so can i.. and this "character" tells me he doesnt care hwat justin thinks cause hes cause enough pain so if it hurts, he can dish it out too.. bleh.. but hes SOOO awesome.. and and.. we went to Rock N Bowl ^_^ he was SOOO cute jfdskla OMG.. haha

AMANDA!!!! RILO KILEY IS COMING TO HOUSTON OCTOBER 21!! 
ALYSSA!!!! RILO KILEY IS COMING TO AUSTIN.. CHECK IT OUT ON THEIR SITE.. AND GO!!AHAH btw. i miss you.. you needa come BACK down!! 

k thats it ^_^ peace out nicas!!
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/12856.html

hmm.. not much to update.. but.. uhh.. yeah..

ive gone in for alot of testing :( !!! OH OH OH  i have something important to say ^_^ k.. next summer.. i can go to the Y, and sign up for a job that deals with little kids.. and they said its GREAT experience if youre looking ot get into the psych. stuff SO.. im applying this spring break ::long time from now:: but im WAYYYY excited.. and its good to put on resumes :D and like.. they come up with activity plans and and.. stuff.. and i get to eat lunch with them and everything.. :) anyone who knows me.. knows i love kids.. so thats that

i leave for florida in a couple of days ^_^ excited.. BAAAAHAHAHA anyways.. im out :)

goodbye to all :)
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/12641.html

wow.. so ive got this guy Jeff.. calling 12 times a day :) hahah this other guy Ash.. wanting to marry and make babies... this other guy thats been my friend since FOREVER.. this other guy Ben who i dont know but he likes my Butt and the way it moves hahah.. another guy that claims to have LOVED me since the 7th grade?.. but the ONE guy i want doesnt want me.. lmao.. LAME.. LAME I SAY.. but all is good! i miss the kid :)

my day was QUITE swell :) i went shopping :) and bought this rad ass Blondie shirt.. and there was another one.. with Pink Floyd on it.. they were cute.. cause it was like a t-shirt.. but cut up and cute looking.. very different.. but i wanted it also.. but i cant spend CRAP LOADS of money.. cause i have to save it for School CLothes.. and i wanna be picky.. and SHOP.. not just pick out some shit and play it off.. i wanna look CUTE dammit.. and make justin want me back.. :) MWAHHAHAH its my ULTIMATE PLAN!! ::evil laugh:: im SOOO gonna knock him dead.. hes gonna be like O_O -OMG WHAT WAS I THINKING LEAVING HER FOR THIS?? I WANT HER BACK! AND WANNA HAVE HER BABIES :) teheheheh :D anyways.. 

hmm.. lemme see.. waht ELSE is interesting to talk about .. hmm... me and my brother got into a fist fight today.. :) over... APPLE SAUCE tehehe cause we bought the variety pack and i wanted a cinnimon one.. and my other brother got one.. and i wanted the last one.. so we Duked it out =P but it was ok.. cause my moms bought me GREEN jello.. wiff.. wiff.. whipped cream ^_^ it looked.. like.. sea FOAM <3 haha anyways

im off to bed.. 

night my loves <33
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/12318.html

I pretend that I'm glad you went away
These four walls closing more every day
And I'm dying inside
And nobody knows it but me
Like a clown I put on a show
Painted real even if nobody knows
And I'm crying inside
And nobody knows it but me

Why didn't I say the things I needed to say
How could I let my angel get away
Now my world is just a-tumblin' down
I can say it so clearly but your nowhere around

The nights are lonely the days are so sad and
I just keep thinking about the love that we had
And I'm missing you 
And nobody knows it but me

I carry a smile when I'm broken in two
And I'm nobody without someone like you
I'm trembling inside 
And nobody knows it but me (yeah)

I lie awake, it's a quarter past three
I'm screaming at night if I thought you'd hear me
Yeah, my heart is calling you
And nobody knows it but me

How blue can I get?
You could ask my heart
But like a jigsaw puzzle it's been torn all apart
A million words couldn't say just how I feel
A million years from now you know I'll be loving you still

The nights are lonely the days are so sad and
I just keep thinking about the love that we had
And I'm missing you 
And nobody knows it but me

Tomorrow morning
I'm hittin the dusty road
Gonna find you where ever
Ever you might go
And I'm gonna load my heart
And hope you come back to me

Say when the nights are lonely
The nights are lonely the days are so sad and
I just keep thinking about the love that we had
And I'm missing you 
And nobody knows it but me

The nights are lonely the days are so sad and
I just keep thinking about the love that we had
And I'm missing you 
And nobody knows it but me

The nights are lonely the days are so sad and
I just keep thinking about the love that we had
And I'm missing you 
And nobody knows it but me
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/12215.html

so i went to "Jeff's" tonight.. MUCH fun.. it was really cool cause we just sat and talked... and watched TV all day lol it was really cute.. hes REAL fun! and SUPER hott! ::sigh:: hes gonna be busy this week with getting physicals done for the Navy... so i wont see him til fri. cause he works thurs. + amanda wanted to go thrifting =P funS! well.. theres nothing more to really say :) just that im content for the first time in a while :D the end[.]

ps. someone PLEASE shoot me =P i have thats DAMNED AshlEE simpson song in my head.. its catchy.. :( OOOOOOOOOOOOOH it feels like i can finally rest my head on something reeeeeal.. i love the way it feeeeeeeels.. jfdklsajfkldsjafkldsjakl ::CHIC CHIC.. BOOOOOM::

later my loves <33
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/11671.html

im happy.. with no reason :) maybe cause im starting to realize lifes better when youre alone sometimes :) 

::wispers:: >> PSSST>> i have a LIST now?? lol never thought that was possible lol but i guess it is now :)

today was awesome.. Troy's benefit went SUPER well:) i wish alyss could have stayed longer.. me and andi hung out at it and talked alot :) im glad things are cool with us.. and im glad WE can be mature about it :) i just with OTHERS would grow up :)

anyHOOT i GOT A NUMBER ::jumps in air.. like on that one movie.. Night at the Roxbury:: hahaha too bad hes a MANWHORE right alyss haha.. DAMN the hott ones..

::sighs:: im off to bed my loves :) night to all..
i think people should call me.. and we can  hang out :) and i can meet MORE people :) and yeah.. I <3 you alll
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/11508.html

Alyss came in today.. something FINALLY feels normal.. like the way it used to be.. if not all of the "old" feeling.. then some of it.. i guess its cause ive lacked a REAL good GIRL friend.. ::sigh:: we went to Late Nite Pie :)with Amanda and it was great.. :) i didnt talk so much only cause i was bizee thinking about stupid CRAP ahha.. 

tomorrow shall be exciting i suppose.. im going to dinner and a movie with Joe :) this shall be fun.. i like being single :).. KINDA>. sorta LONELY but its cool.. i can deal..

nothing much else to say..

night.. i love you :)
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/11246.html

my 4th of July was.. indeed.. the greatest :D.. i hung out with daniel.. then went to a party afterwards and didnt come home til like..2? -ish?? haha.. i dont know but my mom  was cool about it.. she just warned me not to make it a habit or else! ahha but it was super fun :D 

today was GRAND!! GREAT!! WONDERFUL!! haha me and Ash went to the Galleria... then he took me by his school cause he had to scan some comic drawings so he could send em to dallas.. THEN he took me to the Water Wall :D EVERYONE should go! its SOOOO nice/peaceful/??? haha but we had dinner on a blanket in front of the water wall and behind a HUGE building that looked SUPER pretty :D but it was really awesome.. we ate chinese food.. cause its his favorite.. blehhh but it was awesome!! next time.. im bringing Lex :) and anyone else who wants to have a pic nic in the park/waterwall area? haha then we drove by the roxy... ALMOST went in.. haha but i wasnt feelin it..

so all in all my weekend was GREAT

ive been hangin out with Joe too.. hes real cool.. me him and jeromey are going surfing soon! we went friday.. but the waves were... crap? haha its texas for krist sake... BUT.. we made that shit fun.. we're going camping on the beach next weekend :D it SHALL be fun!

ALYSS COMES IN A FEW MORE DAYS
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/10778.html

lol so Ash comes over right?? and we go get tacos.. from his dads taco place haha and theyre GREAT! lol well when we get home.. it POURING!! raining REALLLLLY hard.. he looks at me and is like "guess we can spend time in my car :)" and im like "Ash that sounds GREAT babe... BUT.. i dont think so!" so hes like OOOHH i see!! and he GET OUT.. and starts dancing in the rain.. haha so i get out and start dancing with him hah it was super cute!!! and hes like "It's a REVERSABLE rain dance :D" and i giggle.. and we dance... the end! lol

i LOVE cheesy people.. and Ash is def one :)i havent been this happy in a long time.. its wonderful to have someone that makes you smile :)

Anyone wanna hang out Saturday?! :D

"every day after that in the night
i will dream that im with you
and PROMISE ill never let you go!!" :D
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/10531.html

ok?? so im a comic freak!! ITS KNOWN!! haha as of now... 

i bought 2 tickets to see Spider Man 2.. and of course i picked Ash cause we can talk FOR HOURS about Marvel comics... the look on his face was price.. THENNN he got mad cause i paid for movie tickets

so i gave it about a... 4.. on a 5 scale.. real good.. cept.. too much of a love story.. BUT.. they followed the comic pretty well.. i dont agree with the Peter Parker/Toby McGuire character.. hes too nerdy... Peter Parker in the comic wasnt so nerdy.. or not AS nerdy.. + the webs that he "shoots" out of his wrists arent supposed to come out of that side.. its the OTHER side.. + the HAND makes the webs.. and throws em.. rather than letting em come out of his wrists.. i dont know lol im a nerd :D and i love comics.. ::bows head::

Ash is wonderful.. VERY sweet.. we went to his house after the movie.. and it was SOOO cute.. cause i was looking at his comic book.. and he just started drawing.. and it was amazing.. haha maybe its just my love for art :) as well as his :D but he wants to take me somewhere "special" tomorrow .. kinda excited haha MAYBE!!!! its to the Art Museum!! :D :D the crazy thing is.. he LOVES Monet.. and SO DO I!! haha.. so beautiful from far away.. but so complex looking up close :)

i think this is my turning point.. and i havent talked to justin.. so thats kinda good.. cause i figured the only way to get over someone is NOT to talk to em right? haha

i miss alyss! thank GOOOOOOODNESS shes coming down soon!

the cellular device rings...
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/10369.html

i was going thru my old entries.. adn reading what they said and how almost every one of them talked about how me and justin were shitty.. and how.. we'd argue... :\ and now.. i want nothing else more in this world than to be with him.. one last time.. how we used to be.. i overlooked the good and focused on the bad.. i took for granted the GOOD things we brought each other.. and id give the world to make everything better or ok.. ::sigh::

but at least i can say im coming out of this head strong.. ive learned lessons.. and i know the do's and dont's as apposed to relationships n what not.. i just wish i could show him one last time how ive come to realization with this all...

i cant HATE her... but i want to.. just cause she has what i want the most.. i think we should Ro-SHAM-BOE ((spelling??)) for him lol just kidding.. if its meant to be.. hell come back.. and love me forever.. 

but just in case... im movin on...
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/10043.html

WOW! another GLORIOUS day here in Highlands Texas.. haha only .. not so much...

Being grounded isnt SO SO bad haha minus the part where my mom things she can gimme a LIST of shit that needs to be done around the house :\ BUT.. i guess itll all be over soon.. then the LIST will be cut SHORT haha 

i feel kinda GOOD about today.. like.. its gonna be a GOOD day.. even if its ugly outside!!

MAYBE.. i can go walking in the rain :) sounds nice eh? anyone wanna join?! for a Play Day in the Rain?! haha maybe we can set down some trash bags.. with a little soap :D :D ya know what im saying ;) haha eek

i wish a had a canvas... :( JUST one.. thats all i need

LOVE to all!
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/9848.html

I'll be 18 shortly.. how exciting :D kinda.. i talked to my mom about it and my curfew.. and she was like YEAH!! :D AN EXTRA 30 MINUTES!! :D :D and i was like WTF?? youre kidding right? and she said NO! ahah BUT i dont think itll go down like that.. I WONT STAND FOR IT haha jk

Chris and ROni broke up.. so hes been callin me more :(.. i try not to answer.. cause i know y hes calling... he thinks we should get together.. and i dont want to.. lol so i try to avoid the calls.. even tho i told him that i didnt think it was the best for right now.. since i am still in love with justin :(.. which brings to mind... he told me how bad i broke his heart.. ((not sure how)) but ive never broke it like hes broken mine... he thinks its not fair to give me another chance cause I want to work things out now.. and i can see where he came from.. but i still dont see where he thinks i hurt him more than hes hurt me.. ack.. and he asks me y i still wanna be with him if i think hes hurt me so much n junk.. to be honest.. i dont know the answer to that one either.. but i know that i love him.. and that he was my first love :( but i guess we grow wise of the  mistakes we make :( its just another lesson in life :\ another problem to get over right? no biggie.. i can do it! :D who knows.. maybe hell come to his senses.. and come back.. and realize how much i DO love him.. if he loves me the way he still says he does.. hell come back.. all things happen for reason.. and if he doesnt.. then ill know it wasnt meant to be.. what was that one quote.. if you let something go.. and it comes back.. its your to keep??? haha something like that...

SUPER sad day here in Highlands Texas... im gonna miss The Early November :( and justin's taking Andi in replace of me :( BLEHHHHHH 

well im out.. like... in the Game called Love..

LOVE TO ALL!!
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/9278.html

not much has changed.. BUT.. as my friends have told me.. things will get better with a little effort.. and patience.. :D but its doesnt mean NOTHINGS changed..

i guess theres a + in life right now... Ash.. hes real awesome... and as much as i WANT to wait for justin.. i dont think hes coming back... and if he does.. then thats cool... if he dont... at least ill know i didnt waste my time... Ash is cool.. but were gonna hang out :) and if me and j never get together... well see where things go with us.. hes real rad.. :) and he lets me Party :D and he takes me to his school... and lets me paint :) and hes working on a piece for ME... lol.. awesome eh? hes really talented :D i saw his comic hes working on and its SOOOOO awesome... really rad stuff... hes great.. even tho he takes my mind off justin... i still miss j! :( but its k.. i figured.. if me and Ash dont get together.. at least i know well be good friends :) and if we do get together.. then i think well have an awesome relationship...

im gonna miss the early nov. :( ive never seen em anyways :\

For some reason.. i feel a spark of inspiration coming on... maybe its cause Ash pointed out all the good qualities no one ever has before... i just feel like Life isnt so bad after all... it just takes time ... ::relieving sigh::

I love you Guys :)
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/9134.html

its so fucking hard to look at him and know were "just friends" i feel im the back up.. the rebound.. but ill wait.. ill wait forever..

moms stressing out :( getting sick.. getting depressed...

alex still wont come out.. doesnt eat much.. i called.. and he had nothing to say.. i feel so bad...

i wasted $450...

i wish i had a place... i feel like i dont belong to much anymore.. i can only imgine how alyss feels :(

ANYONE WANT COMPANY AT WARPED TOUR?? CAUSE I WANNA GO :) BUT NO ONE TO GO WITH :(
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/8923.html

well i let justin go... hopefully she makes him happy :\ its hard.. and it hurts... but im sacrificing my happiness for his...

troy is kinda stable... nothings changed.. itll all happen in time :( dales responding alot more :) no new news on roshanda :\

i cant sleep...

i miss alyssa.. my best friend.. :(

i wish i had money :\ cause i need to take lex to get fixed...

tell me WHY.... WHY cant i touch you.. so far away... 

BLEHHHH i HATE sad sappy songs
http://peas-n-carr0ts.livejournal.com/8503.html

so justins prob. picking andi over me :\ how heart breaking :(

troy's no better... kinda the same.. dales improving... everyone else is pretty good... roshanda goes in for hip surgery.. :\

got caught sneekin out last night. :( so ill be grounded.. eek.. but i was at nicks the whole time... we blew some kill.. and my mom was calling... but i didnt wanna go home cause i was blowed... so yeah... i dont know... i dotn care about a whole lot anymore... i really dont.. what for??

i took out $450 of my college savings to come home.. i cant stand it here.. and i need to know where to go with the whole justin thing... i dont.. call me dumb.. cause i know ill think im dumb later when its for nothing.. BUT.. hopefully itll be for the good :) 
(+) being in this house.. with alex.. i cant do it.. i dont know.. i cant talk about it.. i just feel going home is for the best..

i cant go to the funeral... i cant... i wont..

fuck death... fuck stupidity... fuck love... fuck life...
